H0.text: Which political party, founded in 1967, has its headquarters in London and currently has the leader Ian Edward . British National Party

H1.text: Which political party, founded in 1967, has its headquarters in London and currently has the leader Ian Edward . UK Independence Party

H2.text: Which political party, founded in 1967, has its headquarters in London and currently has the leader Ian Edward . English Democrats

H3.text: Which political party, founded in 1967, has its headquarters in London and currently has the leader Ian Edward . NATIONAL FRONT

A4.text: The National Front had its Westminster headquarters.

A5.text: The National Front is currently led by Tony Martin.

A6.text: The National Front was featured in a BBC documentary called 'The Lost Race' in 1999.

A7.text: BBC 1975: National Front rallies against Europe.
